kpi.name: LTE_1075a
kpi.formula:
decode( (lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs0 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs1 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs2 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs3 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs4 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs5 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs6 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs7 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs8 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs9 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs10 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs11 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs12 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs13 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs14 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs15 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs16 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs17 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs18 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs19 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs20 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs21 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs22 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs23 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs24 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs25 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs26 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs27 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs28),0,null,
(0*lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs0 + 1*lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs1 + 2*lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs2 + 3*lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs3 + 4*lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs4 + 5*lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs5 + 6*lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs6 + 7*lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs7 + 8*lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs8 + 9*lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs9 + 10*lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs10 + 11*lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs11 + 12*lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs12 + 13*lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs13 + 14*lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs14 + 15*lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs15 + 16*lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs16 + 17*lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs17 + 18*lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs18 + 19*lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs19 + 20*lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs20 + 21*lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs21 + 22*lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs22 + 23*lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs23 + 24*lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs24 + 25*lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs25 + 26*lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs26 + 27*lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs27 + 28*lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs28) / (lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs0 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs1 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs2 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs3 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs4 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs5 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs6 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs7 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs8 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs9 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs10 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs11 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs12 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs13 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs14 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs15 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs16 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs17 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs18 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs19 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs20 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs21 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs22 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs23 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs24 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs25 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs26 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs27 + lcelld.pusch_trans_using_mcs28))

kpi_info.title: Average used MCS on PUSCH transmissions
kpi_info.use: Average used Modulation and Coding Scheme on PUSCH transmissions
kpi_info.formula:
SUM( 0*PUSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS0 +
1*PUSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS1 +
2*PUSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS2 +
3*PUSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS3 +
4*PUSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS4 +
